title: Rozen Maiden: Ouvertüre
title_jp: ローゼンメイデン・オーベルテュー
synopsis: When Jun buys Shinku a brooch, she refuses to accept it at all costs. Souseiseki then confronts Jun with the reason for Shinku's behavior. The tragic story of Suigintou is told, with the revelation of why her hatred for Shinku could last throughout centuries.
